attributes.additional_details: Let’s make these horrible people get KARMA and hope they get punished. If it was children it would be a different story... Pets are our four legged children! If people get caught let’s make them face the tougher Consequences! I think people who steal pets should be banned from keeping pets and a JAIL sentence!!
attributes.background: The number of pet thefts is on the rise in the UK. People who steal pets always seem to get away with what they’re doing and it’s wrong! People have their ‘family members’ taken from them and we need to make sure these people are caught and have a tougher sentence and never own pets again!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government and Parliament to take to ensure that people who steal pets are punished. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/212174

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the 
Government or Parliament to do.
